justifications: When the remain campaign tells us no one will trade with us if we leave the EU, sorry, it's absolute cobblers.

references: UK should remain in the EU

justifications: our view is that the UK should remain in the EU
Bill Gates, the company's co-founder, has also spoken out separately in favour of the UK remaining in Europe.
Google has publicly posted stats and maps showing what kind of Brexit-related search queries it's been receiving.
Facebook dusted off its 'I am a voter' button for the second time this year in the UK.
